metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39648 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In gadget_dev_desc_UDC_show of configfs.c, there is a possible disclosureof kernel heap memory due to a race condition. This could lead to localinformation disclosure with System execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-160822094References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
